name: Meta Grove
description:
The Meta Grove is a Digital Twin Metaverse of the Central Florida Tech Grove designed to let users take a digital tour of the facility and learn more about its capabilities.

The product features multiplayer connectivity, Ready Player Me avatar customization, dynamically rigged full-body VR characters, and networked voice chat. Users can laser over elements in the environment to learn more about them, as well as browse the web on the embedded browser.

Mission:

The Tech Grove is at the intersection of the military modeling & simulation epicenter and Orlando's claim to being the MetaCenter.  The Tech Grove is uniquely positioned to connect the great work already established by both communities, advancing the successful growth and utilization of the Metaverse for all.

We want a place where we can:

  • Host virtual events
  • Meetings
  • Collaboration
  • Demonstrations

Example Video:
